title: Support variables in UserField
author: vgiuseppe77
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
Variables in UserField are not working anymore.

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->
Pass variable, provided in UserField, to external tools,

## Current Behavior
<!--- If describing a bug, tell us what happens instead of the expected behavior -->
<!--- If suggesting a change/improvement, ex...

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: I've checked v1.72, v1.75.7012, v1.76.18, and the current dev build and couldn't find a version where variables within a field would be expanded. I could see how this would be useful though, so I would consider this an enhancement request. If you can find more information on which version may have had this functionality I'd be glad to take another look.

comments.author: vgiuseppe77
comments.snippet:
Hi sparerd, thank you for answering.
I've checked too, but I can't find the version. However, it was a Dev/Prerelease, I always installed that kind of releases.
I'll keep looking for, but meanwhile thank you for considering it as enhancement request.

comments.author: jlelu
comments.snippet:
Hi,

this feature is not planned in the future releases at moment, right ?
